name: One Night At Slammy's
description:
FIVE NIGHTS AT SLAMMY'S is the ultimate video game, even being described as "pretty ok I guess" by critics and fans alike. It features the three famous animatronics from the Slammy's Pizzeria franchise, named "Slammy" and "Ashley" and "Paul".  All unique in their designs and do not infringe on any copyright law (for legal reasons that is a joke).

Special thanks to BruhMoment76 and AshAnimates who helped me with this project with voice acting. This was originally an easter egg for DOOMORI 2 but we decided to flesh it out as a full minigame. Have fun!

You can join the discord here! : https://discord.gg/zUXTs5XCUG

This is a parody of Five Night's at Freddy's, created by Scott Cawthon.
